title: I Reincarnated But Will Try To Live Without Using My Cheat Ability - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Gods   Kingdom Building   Low-key Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Past Plays a Big Role   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Special Abilities   Strategist   Stubborn Protagonist   Younger Sisters
author: Ookuni Masato   大邦将人
description:
When someone says, “I’ll give you a cheat ability, so just use it”, don’t you feel like not using it?

There is nothing more expensive than free stuff.

It’s not cool to get excited about something you got for free.

In a sense, the protagonist is a reincarnation target, but he perseveres while messing with God’s plans.

God makes a mistake in choosing his reincarnation target, and later learns of it.

He later realizes that it’s not like everyone wants to be strong and not everyone wants to make a harem.

And that he has chosen someone who is more attentive than others and is a real pain in the ass…>
